page.title: 10THE POST OFFICE
page.content:
It is very confusing in the village of Souldrop. The{old school}is a post office and the old post office is a house!
The post office and the village hall share the building which was once the village school. The office is run by the{sub-postmistress}and is open Mondays to Fridays from 9am until 1pm. The main business carried out is the selling of{stamps}and postal orders, paying out{pensions}on Thursdays and dealing with Giro bank transactions. Post is collected daily from the letter box at 10am and at 4pm.
Outside the post office is a{telephone call box. Calls can be dialled from the box to any part of the country for ten pence or more depending on distance.
